entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
